---
title: "Las Anageles Education"
author: "Inam Khan"
---


```{r}
# 1. Load & set up -------------------------------------------
library(tidycensus)
library(dplyr)

# Put your Census API key here once per R session
# census_api_key("YOUR_KEY_HERE", install = TRUE)

# 2. Choose the variables ------------------------------------
vars <- c(
  bach  = "B15003_022",   # Count: Bachelor's degree
  total = "B15003_001"    # Count: Total pop. 25 years +  (denominator)
)

# 3. Download the data ---------------------------------------
la_bach <- get_acs(
  geography = "tract",
  state     = "CA",
  county    = "Los Angeles",
  variables = vars,
  year      = 2023,       # latest released 5‑year file (change if you need)
  survey    = "acs5",
  output    = "wide",     # puts *_E (estimate) columns side‑by‑side
  geometry  = FALSE       # set TRUE if you want spatial shapes for mapping
)

# 4. Calculate percentage ------------------------------------
la_bach <- la_bach %>% 
  mutate(
    pct_bach = 100 * bachE / totalE
  ) %>% 
  select(GEOID, NAME, pct_bach)

# 5. Inspect -------------------------------------------------
head(la_bach)

```
